title: 2BR - 2BR - 9, 10, 11, 12 MONTH LEASE OPTIONS AVAILABLE..
posting_body: ['this third floor 2 bedroom apartment, in the heart of atlanta , is available for aug. sep.', '1st/15th or later', 'and is located steps away from all the restaurants and shops.', 'includes all utilities (heat, electric, hot water, trash) and comes with two dedicated parking spots in the driveway for no extra monthly fee.', 'hardwood floors refinished recently.', 'coin op laundry is in the basement along with extra storage if needed.', 'online application/lease process and rent payments!', 'rent is $975/month.', 'security deposit is $975/month.', 'both due at lease signing.', '9, 10, 11, 12 month lease options available.', 'no smokers.', 'animals older then 2 years old will be considered with a $50 non refundable per animal deposit and $10/month per pet rent.']
